original_text: of which I became a minister according to the stewardship from God that was given to me for you, to make the word of God fully known,
korean_text: 내가 교회의 일꾼 된 것은 하나님이 너희를 위하여 내게 주신 직분을 따라 하나님의 말씀을 이루려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: of which I became a minister
according to the stewardship from God
that was given to me for you
to make the word of God fully known
